text: The Utah House of Representatives is the lower house of the Utah State Legislature, the state legislature of the U.S. state of Utah. The House is made of 75 representatives elected from single member constituent districts. Members of the House are elected to two-year terms without term limits. ==Other websites== *Utah House of Representatives *Utah Republican Party *Utah Democratic Party *Map of Utah House of Representative districts category:Utah Category:State lower houses in the United States
title: Utah House of Representatives
